name: Bean Blaster
description:
This is my first game using Unity: Bean Blaster!

Shoot up waves of totally not suspicious looking enemies and rack up your highscore! Collect health pickups to heal in the fight!

I will add updates to this game in the future!

Instructions:

WASD to move

Use your mouse to look around

left shift to crouch

Left Click to shoot

Right Click to aim

Press R to reload, weapon automatically reloads when out of ammo

Press 1 to set sensitivity to default (don't worry about this)

Press 2 to set sensitivity to Editor (Double sensitivity for editor testing) (don't worry about this)

pls don't judge this is my first game

b e a n s
